sys_ui_message.message: Legal: Compliance with legal or contractual requirements. Business-critical: Avoidance of operational, legal or regulatory risks (e.g. requirements of associationsm concession conditions, Westnetz/E.On regulations) with a probability of occurence > 25%. Value-creating / economic: Value creation over the 3-year utilization period (Mifri perspective). To be determined via a business case. Quality enhancing: increase of user satisfaction and customer acceptance for a certain number of users => user impact (UI) and/or elimination of application errors or workarounds.
